speaker: Doctor
text: What seems to be the trouble, Mr. Burke?

speaker: Patient
text: My body aches. I have a runny nose and a bad cough.

speaker: Doctor
text: Yes, your temperature is very high, too.

speaker: Doctor
text: You have a fever. It looks like you have the flu. Do you have any allergies? I don't think so. Okay, great. I'm going to prescribe some medicine. Please take it twice every day. Once in the morning and once before bed. You should feel better in a few days. Great, thank
